vehicles.description: Ahead in the same lane, there is a white car at a moderate distance, facing the same direction as our vehicle.
vehicles.explanation: The position and speed of the white car will directly affect the speed of the self-driving car and its following distance.

vehicles.description: Various cars are on the adjacent lane, some parallel to this car, while others are at varying distances.
vehicles.explanation: These vehicles may change lanes or influence the flow of traffic; our vehicle needs to adapt to this.

vehicles.description: The black vehicle in the far right lane.
vehicles.explanation: The black vehicle appears to be moving at a steady speed; our vehicle should monitor it to prevent lane changing.

barriers.description: Metal railings have been installed on both sides of the road, with some on the left side appearing as construction markers.
barriers.explanation: The median strip delineates the driving space and restricts lane changes.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there are several vehicles and barriers present:

1. Vehicles:
   - Ahead in the same lane, there is a white car at a moderate distance, facing the same direction as our vehicle. The position and speed of the white car will directly affect the speed of the self-driving car and its following distance.
   - Various cars are on the adjacent lane, some parallel to this car, while others are at varying distances. These vehicles may change lanes or influence the flow of traffic; our vehicle needs to adapt to this.
   - The black vehicle in the far right lane appears to be moving at a steady speed; our vehicle should monitor it to prevent lane changing.

2. Barriers:
   - Metal railings have been installed on both sides of the road, with some on the left side appearing as construction markers. The median strip delineates the driving space and restricts lane changes.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe following distance from the vehicle ahead, observe the lane changing conditions of other vehicles in the surrounding lanes, and be prepared to stop for the red light ahead. Pay attention to the red-and-white striped obstacles on the left, which may indicate changes in lane availability. Keep an eye on the traffic conditions around the black vehicle on your right and be ready to respond to vehicles merging from the right. On rainy days, the roads are slippery, so drive carefully to avoid hydroplaning, and pay attention to any red circular signs that may indicate driving restrictions.

1.description and explanation: The object labeled as 'barrier' is a road divider made from a series of connected metal barriers, which separates lanes of traffic moving in the same or opposite directions to improve safety by reducing the likelihood of head-on collisions. An ego car should take note of this barrier and maintain its lane, avoiding any maneuvers that could potentially bring the vehicle too close to the barrier to prevent scraping or collision.

2.description and explanation: This object is a traffic barrier, typically used on roadways to protect vehicles from leaving the road and to safely guide them in the proper direction. It provides a physical separation between the roadway and other areas, making it clear that the ego car should not cross or enter the barrier-protected zone. The future driving behavior of the ego car should be to maintain a safe distance from the barrier and stay within the designated traffic lanes.
